description: Lions stone the Ravens on 4th-and-goal as Lamar Jackson is stripped at the 1 and Detroit recovers, denying the tie.
On 4th-and-2, Goff drops a dime to St. Brown, and one play later Montgomery rips a 31-yd TD to make it a two-score game.
Detroit caps a 98-yard, 9-minute march with a David Montgomery goal-line TD to reclaim the lead.
On 4th-and-1, Detroit runs a gadget pitch from St. Brown to Gibbs for a walk-in touchdown.
Aiden Hutchinson punches the ball from Derrick Henry, and DJ Reed recovers to set up insurance points.
